entry.title: Metro Sound
entry.content:
Metro Sound is the imprint label of Metropolis Blue dedicated to electronic musicians and DJs of ACM.

Similarly, I am working on digital marketing campaigns of the brand through Instagram and Facebook and coordinating the design and functionality of the official website.
entry.summary: Metro Sound is the imprint label of Metropolis Blue dedicated to electronic musicians and DJs of ACM.

entry.title: Metropolis Blue
entry.content:
Metropolis Blue is a joint venture by Metropolis Studios and ACM. The label is run by - and dedicated to - students of the university.

Since March I have been working on multiple small digital marketing campaigns for the brand through Instagram and Facebook; utilising my skillset in graphic design and video editing software. Recently, I have been collaborating with a web developer on the official Metropolis Blue website.
entry.summary: Metropolis Blue is a joint venture by Metropolis Studios and ACM. The label is run by - and dedicated to - students of the university.
